short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An easier way to search the web from an opened tab!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Due to trademark complaint from Google LLC I re-branded the extension. It is the same extension but with more options and a different name ;)
---------------------------------------------------------------
Don't open a new tab... Search right from where you are! You can search anything from the extension or just select a word in an opened tab and search it in some of the most popular and helpful services from the right-click menu!
The customizable shortcuts and great appearance make it the best searching tool Iâ€™ve ever made!
---------------------------------------------------------------
New in the rebranded version 4.0:
-Rebranding, Improved Appearance and Design
-New logo and name due to trademark complaint from Google LLC
-Brand new design for the options menu
-Popup Theme options (Classic/Dark)
-Customize the shortcuts under the search bar (Label, Link, Color)
-Search autocompletion
